Class AlarmClockTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • tests.AlarmClockTest

  • public class AlarmClockTest
extends java.lang.Object
    The test class for the AlarmClock class
    Author:
    Florian FAGNIEZ, Brian GOHIER, Noemie RULLIER

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private AlarmClock alarm 
      static boolean ALARM_CLOCK_IN_TEST
      Set this constant to true to specify you are using JUnit for tests, this will disable the Graphic User Interfaces for alarm clock
